activities: TRC Global Solutions is a busines service company that provides employee relocation and assignment management services to companies in 150+ countries worldwide, including within the EU and Switzerland.  We collect personal information from clients and customers in the EU and Switzerland to deliver contracted services to our clients and customers.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Information covered includes organization, client and customer data, inclusive of manually processed data.
recoursemech: TRC has opted to use the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and/or Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) to resolve complaints.
